# Seek Eternal Rest (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 182

*You invoke the greater powers and are infused with a great, golden glow, empowering you with holy glory.*

You improve your ability to turn undead. For the purpose of turning or destroying undead, you are treated as a cleric of your paladin level.
